title: Drift Races
headline: Drift Races
subtitle: Coming Soon to GTA Online
content:
Racing fans get a slick new way to win with GTA Onlineâ€™s new drifting modification for select vehicles and Drift Races Series.

Drivers can test their skills at getting sideways in a series of new circuits, while a visit to the LS Car Meet will offer select vehicles the option of adding a drift tuning modification that brings the joys of drifting to Freemode.
